title: Crime 101
description: The story follows a mysterious thief planning one last heist, who encounters a disillusioned insurance broker. As their fates intertwine in a perilous adventure, they are pursued by a detective determined to thwart their plans.

title: Wuthering Heights
description: It follows the turbulent love story between Catherine Earnshaw and Heathcliff, an orphan who was adopted by her family and grew up in love with her, but he suffers from social marginalization, which leads to the end of their relationship and Heathcliffâ€™s quest for revenge.

title: Hell in Paradise
description: After taking a job at a luxury hotel in the Maldives, immigrant Nina's island paradise turns into a nightmare after an incident. After being wrongfully accused, she must avoid traps to escape an unfair life sentence.

title: Charlie the Wonderdog
description: A dog named Charlie gains supernatural powers after being kidnapped by aliens. While gaining fame and recognition, he sets out to fight an evil cat that threatens humanity.

title: Killer Whale
description: The story of two friends Maddie and Trish, as they find themselves trapped in a remote lagoon in a battle for survival, when they are attacked by a monstrous and deadly whale named Ceto.

title: The Housemaid
description: A woman struggles to rebuild her life, so she is delighted by the opportunity to work as a maid for a wealthy, elite couple.

title: Shelter
description: A  reclusive man on a remote Scottish island saves a girl from drowning in a terrible storm, which sets in motion a series of dangerous events, including an attack on his home, forcing him to confront his troubled past.

title: Send Help
description: Two co-workers become the sole survivors of a plane crash and find themselves on a deserted island, as they must work together to survive and overcome the past, but it takes will and intelligence to make it out alive.

title: Mercy
description: The life of a detective is turned upside down after he is wrongfully accused of committing a serious crime, and he sets out to clear his name.

title: Hamnet
description: It chronicles the story of Agnes, William Shakespeare's wife, and her struggle to cope with the death of their only son, Hamnet. His story is considered the inspiration behind Shakespeare's famous play Hamlet.

title: Allly baqi mink
description: A Palestinian teenager is drawn into the protests in the West Bank, and his mother recounts the familyâ€™s story filled with hope, courage, and struggle that led to this decisive moment and his participation in the protests.

title: Return to Silent Hill
description: After receiving a mysterious letter asking him to come back, James decides to visit Silent Hill, where he encounters numerous recognizable and unrecognizable horrors in a city full of terror.

title: Primate
description: College student Lucy and her friends try to survive when her family's pet chimp becomes infected with rabies, becoming aggressive and dangerous. They devise different ways to survive from the ferocious primate.

title: Doraemon: Nobita's Art World Tales
description: A mysterious wooden panel in Nobita's living room transports him, Doraemon, and his pals to the fantastical Kingdom of "Artoria," which is based on paintings. They encounter Claire, a time-traveling girl, there and learn of a danger that might strip the planet of its colors.

title: Greenland: Migration
description: Forced to leave their safe haven in Greenland, the Garrity family embarks on a perilous journey across the frozen and deadly lands of Europe to find a new home.

title: Gawaza Wala Gnaza
description: A couple prepares to hold a perfect wedding, but things turn upside down when a death occurs that disrupts their grand ceremony.

title: En Ghab El Qot
description: The theft of a famous painting from a museum leads to an unexpected conflict between the gang members and the museum staff, and amid this, an unusual romantic relationship develops.

title: Almulhid
description: The events deal with the idea of â€‹â€‹religious extremism and atheism affecting young people and its impact on society.

title: Anaconda
description: Amidst a midlife crisis, a group of friends decide to work together to remake their favorite movie from their youth, but the journey leads them to a series of unforeseen events in the jungle.

title: The SpongeBob Movie: Search for Squarepants
description: SpongeBob travels to the depths of the ocean to fight the Flying Dutchman, facing many challenges along the way and uncovering many marine secrets.

title: Avatar: Fire and Ash
description: In the third part of Avatar, ex-human Jake Sully, who lives with the Na'vi clan, continues his adventures in light of the new challenges facing the clan after becoming their leader.

title: Dept. Q
description: Carl, who once was a first-class detective, feels guilty after an attack in which his partner got paralyzed and another cop died. However, his life is consumed by a cold case he undertakes when he goes back to work.

title: El Sett
description: The film explores the biography of the Star of the East (Umm Kulthum), highlighting the most important milestones in her personal and artistic life, and the relationships that had a significant impact on her career.

title: Zootopia 2
description: Brave policewoman Judy Hopps teams up with her fox friend Nick Wilde to solve a new case, but it's not an ordinary case, it's the most dangerous and complex case of their lives.

title: Al Selm w Al Thoban: Leab Eyal
description: Ahmed meets Malak, and their relationship quickly transforms from mere admiration to mutual love. Each of them strives to impress the other with their personality and actions, hoping that their love story will last forever and withstand all challenges.

title: Wa Lana Fel Khayal Hob
description: An introverted university professor has a female student enter his life, and events develop such that he becomes involved in her relationship with her lover and he is forced to confront himself with the fact that he is also falling in love with her.

title: Kulunia
description: Over the course of one long night,  a father and his son each  discover many secrets about the other, and together they try to overcome all the differences of the past and move forward.

title: Oscar: Awdat Al Mammoth
description: When a mammoth, a huge extinct creature, comes back to life following scientific experimentation through genetic modifications, it roams the heart of Cairo, as events accelerate through the streets of the city.

title: Rocky El Ghalaba
description: A young girl works as a bodyguard and is responsible for guarding and securing a major businessman, and together, they go through many interesting comedic situations.

title: Lilo & Stitch
description: A rebellious little girl named Lilo adopts a dog and names him Stitch. Over time, she discovers that he is an alien who escaped to Earth from the scientist who tortured him.
